entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Ronge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Ronge Airport 02:55 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -20.5°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 20 except near minus 15 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20 except near minus 15 over southern sections. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:24 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:24 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:24 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
